casebody.data:
In the Matter of M.K.B.
Appealed by Mother. No. 90P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 10, 2008. Niamalikia Roberts, Pro Se, for Roberts. Tyrone C. Wade, Charlotte, for Mecklenburg County DSS. Pamela Williams, for Guardian ad Litem.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 20th day of February 2008 by Respondent (Mother) in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 731, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 10th day of April 2008."
